instructions: Image titled Remove Content Lock Step 1 1 Navigate to the EE My Account page at https://myaccount.ee.co.uk/login-dispatch/ . Use any other method in this article to remove Content Lock if you have a pay-as-you-go account with EE, Orange, or T-Mobile. Pay-as-you-go customers cannot remove Content Lock using the online method. Image titled Remove Content Lock Step 2 2 Click on Mobile and sign in to your EE account using your mobile telephone number. You must be logged in as the primary account holder to remove Content Lock. Image titled Remove Content Lock Step 3 3 Click on Device and usage. If using Orange or T-Mobile service, this option will read as Manage your phone. Image titled Remove Content Lock Step 4 4 Scroll down to Content Lock, then select Off. Image titled Remove Content Lock Step 5 5 Select the option to save your settings. You can now view all Internet content on your device, including adult content. [1] Advertisement
